title: 怎么把Owner组里的所有人变成普通玩家？
author: ModernDevil
txt_content: 或者直接删除Owner组 求大触。

replies.author: fujinyang
replies.txt_content: --你把owner组内的权限改成defult的权限就可以了

replies.author: lpc123123
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xkw794154235
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: q1979900898
replies.txt_content: 把owner组内的权限改成defult的权限
